meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sake</radical> radical and the <kanji>sake</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Sweet.
readingMnemonic: For the <kanji>sake</kanji> of convenience, companies will use <reading>ea</reading>gles (い) for delivery jobs in the future. Just put in an order, and it'll be at your doorstep in no time flat. Eagles are like, super fast at delivery.
